casebody.data:
MCCOY
v.
NC DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE 226P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2019

Mr. Timothy Morris McCoy, For McCoy, Timothy Morris

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th of June 2019 by Petitioner for Appeal Against Final Decision:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2019."
